Test a user agent against multiple sites

Source: R/blocking.R
test_ua_all_sites.Rd

Tests a single user agent string against a list of websites and returns aggregated results including a blocking score.

Usage

test_ua_all_sites(user_agent, sites = default_test_sites(), delay = 0.5)

Arguments

user_agent

User agent string to test

sites

Character vector of URLs to test against (default: default_test_sites())

delay

Delay between requests in seconds (default 0.5)

Value

A tibble with per-site results and an overall blocking score

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
results <- test_ua_all_sites(
  "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) Chrome/120.0.0.0",
  sites = c("https://httpbin.org/user-agent", "https://www.google.com/")
)
} # }
